descriptors.name: amazon_sidewalk_dmp_soc_light
descriptors.label: Amazon Sidewalk - SoC Dynamic Multiprotocol Light
descriptors.description: This is a Dynamic Multiprotocol reference application demonstrating a light bulb that can be switched via Bluetooth. Can be tested with the EFR Connect mobile app. Simultaneously this sample application leverages the Amazon Sidewalk protocol to connect to the cloud using FSK radio layer. The application connects to AWS and send or receive messages on button push.
